you don't see here the last version (3.3.2), get it at <a href=\"https://freeshell.de/~kaosmos/importexporttools-en.html\" rel=\"nofollow\">my website</a>, it <b>should</b> fix the bugs with TB60.\n\nThis extension allows the user to export and import folders and messages with lots of options, for example:\n\n<b>Tools Menu --&gt; ImportExportTools or Context menu on folders panel --&gt; Import/Export</b>\n- export of folder in a single file (mbox format), with also the subfolders if you want;\n- export of all messages in single files (eml or html or plain text format or CSV), with attachments and an index;\n- export of all messages in PDF format (required ImportExportTools 3.0 or higher)\n- export of all messages in one single plain text file;\n- export of index of the messages in a folder (HTML or CSV format);\n- mbox files import;\n- eml files import;\n- emlx files import;\n- import of all the eml files existing in a directory;\n- export of all files of all mail files of the profile (just from the \"Tools\" menu);\n- import of a saved profile (just from the \"Tools\" menu, required ImportExportTools 3.0 or higher, not available for Seamonkey)\n- search with various criteria and export messages;\n- import SMS from the programs \"SMS Backup and Restore\" for Android and Nokia2AndroidSMS;\n\n<b>File menu --&gt; Save selected messages or Context menu of thread panel --&gt; Save selected messages</b>\n- saving multiple messages in eml/html/plain text format with just one click;\n- saving multiple messages in PDF format with just one click (required ImportExportTools 3.0 or higher)\n\n<b>Message menu --&gt; Copy to clipboard or Context menu of thread panel --&gt; Copy to clipboard</b>\n- copy the message or all headers to clipboard.\n\n<b>Context menu on an EML attachment</b>\n- import file in the folder\n\n <b>ImportExportTools can also perform a scheduled backup of all profile's files or just of mail files and NOW CAN IMPORT A SAVED PROFILE (required ImportExportTools 3.0 or higher, not available for Seamonkey)</b>\n\n<b>Note: if you want to import messages or MBOX files, you must first select a valid folder as a target, otherwise the import options are disabled</b>\n\nFor more details visit <a href=\"https://freeshell.de/~kaosmos/mboximport-en.html\" rel=\"nofollow\">https://freeshell.de/~kaosmos/mboximport-en.html</a>\n\nIn my website you can find lots of extensions and maybe some of them could interest you, so have a peek.\n\nTo contact me, please use my email address in my homepage.\nIf you want to make a donation for my work, you can find the link in my webpage.","it":"Se qui non è presente l'ultima  versione (3.3.2), si può scaricarla dal <a href=\"https://freeshell.de/~kaosmos/importexporttools-en.html\" rel=\"nofollow\">mio sito</a>, <b>dovrebbe</b> risolvere i bug con TB60.\n\nImportExportTools consente di esportare e importare i messaggi con maggiore flessibilità, prevedendo le seguenti opzioni:\n\n<b>Menù Strumenti --&gt; ImportExportTools\nMenù contestuale sul pannello delle cartelle --&gt; Importa/Esporta</b>\n\n    - esportazione delle cartelle in un unico file (formato mbox), eventualmente con le sottocartelle;\n    - esportazione di tutti i messaggi presenti nella cartella in file individuali (formato eml);\n    - esportazione di tutti i messaggi presenti nella cartella in file individuali (formato html o testo), con un indice;\n    - esportazione di tutti i messaggi presenti nella cartella in unico file in formato testo;\n    - esportazione di tutti i messaggi presenti nella cartella in formato PDF (richiede ImportExporTools 3.0 o superiori);\n    - creazione del solo indice dei messaggi contenuti in una cartella (formato HTML o CSV);\n    - importazione file mbox;\n    - importazione file eml singoli;\n    - importazione file emlx singoli;\n    - importazione di tutti file eml presenti in una directory;\n    - esportazione di tutti i file del profilo o di tutti file di posta di un profilo (solo dal menù \"Strumenti\");\n    - ricerca ed esportazione di messaggi con criteri simili a quelli dei filtri;\n\n<b>Menù File --&gt; Salva messaggi selezionati\nMenù contestuale sul pannello dei messaggi --&gt; Salva messaggi selezionati</b>\n\n    - salvataggio in formato eml/html/testo dei messaggi selezionati con un solo click; \n    - salvataggio in formato PDF dei messaggi selezionati con un solo click (richiede ImportExporTools 3.0 o superiori);\n\n<b>Menù Messaggio --&gt; Copia negli appunti\nMenù contestuale sul pannello dei messaggi --&gt; Copia negli appunti</b>\n\n    - copia il messaggio completo o solo le intestazioni negli appunti. \n\n<b>Menù contestuale sull'icona di un allegato EML\n\n    - importa il messaggio nella cartella</b>\n\n<b>L'estensione ha un'opzione per avere un backup periodico di tutti i file del profilo o solo dei messaggi e ora PUO' ANCHE IMPORTARE UN PROFILO PRECEDENTEMENTE SALVATO.</b>\n\n<b>N.B.: se si vuole importare dei messaggi, è necessario selezionare una cartella come destinazione, altrimenti le opzioni saranno disabilitate.</b>\n\nPer maggiori informazioni, visitare il sito <a href=\"https://freeshell.de/~kaosmos/mboximport.html\" rel=\"nofollow\">https://freeshell.de/~kaosmos/mboximport.html</a>\n\nNel mio sito, si possono trovare molte altre estensioni расширение добавляет пункт «Сортировка папок вручную» в меню «Инструменты» Thunderbird.\n\nПо умолчанию Thunderbird сортирует папки учётной записи в алфавитном порядке. Это расширение позволяет вам выбрать собственный порядок сортировки папок, например, поместив в начале списка самые важные или переупорядочить их вручную.\n\nЭто расширение также изменяет способ автоматической сортировки папок. При этом, в отличие от стандартного способа, учитываются специальные символы Юникода. Если вы не хотите сортировать все папки вручную, добавьте юникод-символ (например, звёздочка «✸») в начале имени тех папок, которые должны находиться на вершине списка.\n\nЭто также работает для групп новостей в учётных записях блогов и лент новостей и папок любого уровня вложенности.\n\nК тому же, вы можете аналогичным способом переупорядочить и учётные записи, теперь для этого есть специальная вкладка.","fr":"<b>Cette extension permet de trier manuellement les dossiers dans la liste des dossiers de Thunderbird. Voir \"Manually sort folders\" dans le menu \"Outils\".</b>\n\nUne autre possibilité offerte par cette extension est de trier automatiquement les dossiers mais en prenant en compte (contrairement à Thunderbird par défaut) les caractères Unicode. Ceci permet, par exemple, de mettre une étoile unicode ✸ au début d'un nom de dossier de manière à le faire apparaître en haut de la liste. Avec des caractères unicode différents, on peut ainsi faire de petites catégories de dossiers sans s'encombrer d'un tri manuel ou de sous-dossiers.\n\nIl est à noter que depuis la version 0.3 cette extension permet aussi de réordonner les comptes et plus seulement les dossiers d'un compte donné.","en-US":"<b>This extension adds a \"Manually Sort Folders\" entry in the \"Tools\" menu of Thunderbird.</b>\n\nBy default Thunderbird sorts the folders of an account alphabetically. This extension allows you to choose a specific sort order for your folders, allowing you to put the most important ones on top, and manually order them.\n\nThis extension also offers another method for automatically sorting folders. Unlike Thunderbird's default, the extension's sort method takes into account Unicode special characters. If you do not wish to sort everything manually, you can use Unicode symbols at the beginning of your folder names to put them on top. For instance, you can put a Unicode star ✸ at the beginning of your folder name to put it on top of the list without having to sort everything manually.\n\nThis also works for newsgroups inside a news accounts, and also works for sub-folders, and sub-subfolders, etc.\n\nAs a bonus feature, <b>you can also re-order accounts as well</b>, there's an extra tab for that now. The latest version now also allows you to <b>choose the default startup folder</b>.\n\n(Note: there have been reports that running the addon through <a href=\"http://addonconverter.fotokraina.com/\" rel=\"nofollow\">http://addonconverter.fotokraina.com/</a> makes it compatible with SeaMonkey.)","pl":"Rozszerzenie dodaje do w menu „Narzędzia” element „Sortuj foldery ręcznie”.\n\nThunderbird domyślnie sortuje foldery alfabetycznie. Dzięki temu rozszerzeniu można ręcznie określić kolejność folderów umieszczając na górze najważniejsze.\n\nManually Sort Folders oferuje również inną metodę automatycznego sortowania folderów niż domyślna. Rozszerzenie stosuje metodę sortowania uwzględniającą znaki specjalne Unicode. Jeśli nie chce się porządkować wszystko ręcznie, można użyć symboli Unicodee na początku nazw folderu, aby umieścić je na górze. Na przykład można umieścić na początku nazwy folderu symbol Unicode w postaci gwiazdki, by umieścić folder na szczycie listy.\n\nTa funkcja działa również na grupach dyskusyjnych w obrębie kont, a także w folderach podrzędnych itp.\n\nRozszerzenie umożliwia również <b>zmianę kolejności wyświetlania kont</b>.","sv-SE":"<b>Detta tillägg lägger till posten \"Sortera mappar manuellt\" i Thunderbirds Verktyg-meny.</b>\n\nSom standard sorterar Thunderbird mappar under ett konto i alfabetisk ordning. Detta tillägg låter dig välja en specifik sorteringsordning för dina mappar, vilket ger dig möjligheten att placera de viktigaste mapparna överst och sortera dem manuellt.\n\nDetta tillägg erbjuder även en metod för automatisk sortering av mappar. Till skillnad från Thunderbirds standardmetod, tar tilläggets sorteringsmetod hänsyn till Unicode-specialtecken. Om du inte vill sortera allting manuellt, kan du använda Unicode-symboler i början av dina mappnamn för att placera dem överst. Du kan, exempelvis, ange en Unicode-stjärna (✸) i början av ett mappnamn för att placera mappen överst i listan utan att behöva sortera allting manuellt.\n\nDet här fungerar även för diskussionsgrupper under diskussionsgruppskonton och för undermappar, underundermappar, o.s.v.\n\nSom en bonusfunktion kan du även sortera om konton, det finns en extra flik för det nu. Den senaste versionen låter dig dessutom välja vilken standardstartmapp som skall visas vid programstart."},"developer_comments":{"sv-SE":"Detta tillägg är tämligen stabilt. Check out the <a href=\"https://github.com/TB-throwback/LookOut-fix-version/\" rel=\"nofollow\">Git Repository</a> to contribute.</strong>\n\n<strong>Thunderbird Beta Users Please Note:</strong> Initial support is under development and available through the <a href=\"https://github.com/TB-throwback/LookOut-fix-version/releases\" rel=\"nofollow\">Git Repository</a> for testing\n\nOriginal LookOut add-on by Aron Rubin for Mozilla Thunderbird is abandoned September 30, 2011:\n<a href=\"https://addons.mozilla.org/addon/lookout/\" rel=\"nofollow\">https://addons.mozilla.org/addon/lookout/</a>\n\nDoes it mean its death? Of course not! It has been reborn! I brought it back to life!\nNow it is called LookOut (fix version) and works with all new Thunderbird versions.\n\nLookOut (fix version) - based on last version LookOut+ 1.2.15 by Attila K. Mergl (Last Updated: October 15, 2013)\n<a href=\"https://addons.mozilla.org/addon/lookout-1/\" rel=\"nofollow\">https://addons.mozilla.org/addon/lookout-1/</a>\n\n<strong>Please before use, remove or disable the original LookOut and LookOut+ !</strong>\n\n=====================\nWhat is LookOut?\n\nLookOut is a plugin which allows Thunderbird (and SeaMonkey) to interface with Microsoft's mail tools by decoding metadata and attachments encapsulated/embedded in a TNEF encoded attachment (aka <strong>winmail.dat</strong>). \nThe TNEF decoding engine was inspired (with permission) by the <a href=\"http://tnef.sf.net/\" rel=\"nofollow\">TNEF project</a>. LookOut has a full MAPI decoder and the ability to transcode some of those properties to iCalendar (ics) and vCard (vcf) formats. \nAs an option all MAPI properties within a email can be viewed so other types of information can be deciphered."},"developer_comments":null,"edit_url":"https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-US/developers/addon/lookout-fix-version/edit","guid":"lookout@s3_fix_version","has_eula":false,"has_privacy_policy":false,"homepage":{"en-US":"https://github.com/TB-throwback/LookOut-fix-version/"},"icon_url":"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/addon_icons/711/711780-64.png?modified=ebeaf2a5","icons":{"32":"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/addon_icons/711/711780-32.png?modified=ebeaf2a5","64":"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/addon_icons/711/711780-64.png?modified=ebeaf2a5"},"is_disabled":false,"is_experimental":false,"is_featured":false,"is_source_public":true,"last_updated":"2019-08-30T15:25:24Z","name":{"en-US":"LookOut (fix version)","hu":"MutasdMeg! version 2.1.13 for TB 60 and earlier.  3.1.x is only for Thunderbird 67 beta and later.  Thunderbird 68 should work with version 3.1.6 and later</b>.  See <a href=\"http://www.pirules.org/blog/?p=490\" rel=\"nofollow\">my blog</a> for details and instructions for TB 60 and 68.\n\nSynchronizes contacts between Thunderbird and one or more Google accounts.  It can synchronize the My Contacts group, all contacts, or all contacts and groups (with mailing lists).\n\n<b>Please read the FAQs before posting a review: <a href=\"http://www.pirules.org/addons/gcontactsync/faq.php\" rel=\"nofollow\">http://www.pirules.org/addons/gcontactsync/faq.php</a>. Questions and requests for help should be posted in the <a href=\"http://pirules.org/forum/index.php\" rel=\"nofollow\">forum</a> instead of a review.</b>\n\n*Important*\nNOTE: Mailing lists are buggy, but gContactSync tries to work around these bugs whenever possible.  By default 3.0.0 and later skip contacts without email addresses.  If you change this the fake e-mail addresses nobody...@nowhere.invalid are necessary to prevent bugs in mailing lists and are only stored in Thunderbird (they'll never make it to Google).  It is best to drag contacts into the main address book and add them to groups from Google's interface.\n\nPlease read the Developer Comments as well.","de":"gContactSync synchronizes contacts between Thunderbird or Seamonkey and one or more Google accounts.  It can synchronize on the My Contacts group, all contacts, or all contacts and groups (with mailing lists).  Many mobile devices and some other sync apps only synchronize with the My Contacts group, so most people can choose that option after logging in for the first time.\n\n*Important*\nNOTE: Mailing lists are buggy, but gContactSync tries to work around these bugs whenever possible.  The fake e-mail addresses nobody...@nowhere.invalid are necessary to prevent bugs in mailing lists.  It is best to drag contacts into the main address book and add them to groups from Google's interface.\n\nDon't try to delete or rename \"My Contacts\", \"Coworkers\", \"Family\", or \"Friends\" or you may have to 'reset' that address book.\n\nTutorial/Demo (work in progress): <a href=\"http://www.pirules.org/extensions/gcontactsync/tutorial/intro.php\" rel=\"nofollow\">http://www.pirules.org/extensions/gcontactsync/tutorial/intro.php</a>\n\nIt makes several modifications and improvements to the Address Book including more fields and types for several fields.\n\nSupported applications:\n<ul><li>Thunderbird 2 and up (including 3.0 and 3.1)</li><li>Seamonkey 2 and up</li><li>Icedove (Debian-branded Thunderbird)</li><li>Support for Postbox coming soon</li></ul>\nPlease read the Developer Comments as well."},"developer_comments":{"en-US":"You may synchronize one account with several address books, synchronizing an address book with only one group of your choice, and can import contacts from Facebook and Twitter.&lt;br&gt;\n\nIf you choose to synchronize all contacts and groups don't try to delete or rename \"My Contacts\", \"Coworkers\", \"Family\", or \"Friends\" or you may have to 'reset' that address book.  Google requires these groups for every account, including Google Apps accounts where you can't see them online.&lt;br&gt;\n\nIf you find a bug or have a question, please let me know about it.  See the support information for the details.\n\nNote: Mailing Lists in Thunderbird in Seamonkey are still somewhat buggy, especially when contacts are dragged and dropped into them.  They don't work with contacts that don't have e-mail addresses, so gContactSync will add e-mail addresses like nobody@nowhere.invalid.\n\nIf you are interested in browsing the source or using the very latest version of this add-on its git repository may be found here: <a href=\"https://github.com/jdgeenen/gcontactsync\" rel=\"nofollow\">https://github.com/jdgeenen/gcontactsync</a>\n\n<b>Please read the FAQs before posting a review <a href=\"http://www.pirules.org/addons/gcontactsync/faq.php\" rel=\"nofollow\">http://www.pirules.org/addons/gcontactsync/faq.php</a></b>","de":"I have several new features planned for 0.3.0 and welcome more suggestions.  0.3 will allow synchronizing one account with several address books and supports synchronizing an address book with only one group of your choice.\n\nIf you find a bug or have a question, please let me know about it. module ajoute un symbole dans le panneau d'en-tête du message pour basculer entre une vue compacte et détaillée. La vue compacte peut être configuré sur une ou deux lignes.\n\nUne boîte de dialogue de personnalisation est accessible par un clic-droit dans le panneau d'en-tête des messages.\n\nAttention, ce module est incompatible avec CustomizeHeaderToolbar <a href=\"https://addons.mozilla.org/thunderbird/addon/45601\" rel=\"nofollow\">https://addons.mozilla.org/thunderbird/addon/45601</a>\n\nLe raccourci clavier \"MAJ + h\" permet de basculer entre la vue compacte et détaillée.\n\nCe module intègre également la fonctionnalité de «RSS Linkify Sujet\" par Alex Dedul (<a href=\"https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/thunderbird/addon/1704)\" rel=\"nofollow\">https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/thunderbird/addon/1704)</a>.\n\nIl y a aussi une option pour n'afficher que les adresses e-mail dans la vue compacte.\n\nSi vous souhaitez utiliser la dernière version, vous la trouverez sur le canal du développement du module, en bas de cette page.\n\nSi vous rencontrez un bug merci de le rapporter sur le fil dédié de Mozillazine (en Anglais): <a href=\"http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=29&amp;t=1405155\" rel=\"nofollow\">http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=29&amp;t=1405155</a>","en-US":"For Thunderbird 68.0 or newer you can use the beta version available at <a href=\"https://github.com/jmozmoz/compactheader/releases\" rel=\"nofollow\">https://github.com/jmozmoz/compactheader/releases</a>\n\nFor versions older then Thunderbird 37 use version 2.0.9 (see the <a href=\"https://addons.mozilla.org/de/thunderbird/addon/compactheader/versions/\" rel=\"nofollow\">version histroy</a>)\n\nThunderbird does not anymore have the ability to reduce the display size of header pane to one line (as in Thunderbird 2.0). This add-on adds a symbol to compact and expand the message header plane. The compact header view mode can be set to either one or two lines.\n\nA customization dialog can be opened for the toolbar in the header pane (right mouse button context menu) to change the displayed buttons and their style.\n\nThe shortcut \"SHIFT+h\" can be used to toggle between expanded and compact header view.\n\nThis add-on integrates the functionality of \"RSS Linkify Subject\" by Alex Dedul (<a href=\"https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/thunderbird/addon/1704)\" rel=\"nofollow\">https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/thunderbird/addon/1704)</a>.\n\nThere is also an option to display only the email addresses in the compact header view. Another option enables darkening the message header, if the message pane has focus.\n\nIf you want to use the latest version, look for it at <a href=\"http://compactheader.mozdev.org/installation.html\" rel=\"nofollow\">http://compactheader.mozdev.org/installation.html</a> There you will find the latest beta versions.\n\nThere are several bug reports about a disappearing header pane in the compact header view mode. I could reproduce it if the TB Header Tools Extension is installed at the same time, see <a href=\"http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?p=8543415#p8543415\" rel=\"nofollow\">http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?p=8543415#p8543415</a>\n\nIf you encounter any bug please post information at the support thread at mozillazine:\n<a Tusen tack, Andrew!","es":"Cambia el comando \"enviar después\" (Ctrl+May+Enter) en la ventana de composición de mensajes, para que en vez de simplemente copiar el mensaje a la bandeja de salida para enviarse la siguiente vez que Vd. se conecte (o ejecute \"procesar mensajes\" no enviados), un diálogo aparezca para permitirle especificar cuándo se enviará el mensaje.\n\nPuede especificar una fecha y hora específicas o hacer click en \"15 minutos más tarde\", \"30 minutos más tarde\" o \"2 horas más tarde\", o, alternativamente, pulsar \"enviar a bandeja de salida\" para tener la funcionalidad nativa de Thunderbird para envío diferido.\n\nPara información adicional, mire la guía de usuario en: <a href=\"https://blog.kamens.us/send-later\" rel=\"nofollow\">Send Later user guide</a>.\n\nApúntese a la ilsta de correo en: <a href=\"https://groups.google.com/group/send-later-users\" rel=\"nofollow\">mailing list</a>!\n\nEnviarDespués (SendeLater) utiliza <a href=\"https://sugarjs.com/\" rel=\"nofollow\">SugarJS</a> por Andrew Plummer. ¡Gracias Andrew!","ru":"Вызывайте команду \"Send Later\" (Ctrl+Shift+Return) из окна редактирования письма, чтобы взамен простого копирования сообщения в вашу папку «Исходящие» оно было бы отправлено в следующий раз, когда вы будете онлайн или отправите «Неотправленные сообщения». Эту команду возможно изменить в диалоговом окне, позволяющем указать время отправки сообщения.\n\nЧтобы воспользоваться встроенной функцией \"Send Later\" в Thunderbird (например, скопировать в папку «Исходящие»), Вы можете установить определенное время и дату или нажать на клавиши \"15 минут спустя\", или \"30 минут спустя\", или \"2 часа спустя\", или \"Поместить в папку «Исходящие»\".\n\nДля дополнительной информации смотрите <a href=\"https://blog.kamens.us/send-later\" rel=\"nofollow\">Руководство Пользователя</a>.\n\nПодпишитесь на <a href=\"https://groups.google.com/group/send-later-users\" rel=\"nofollow\">рассылку</a>!\n\nSend Later использует <a href=\"https://sugarjs.com/\" rel=\"nofollow\">SugarJS</a> Андрея Пламмера. Bedankt Andrew!","en-US":"Changes the \"Send Later\" command (Ctrl+Shift+Return) in the message composition window, so that instead of merely copying the message into your Outbox so that it is sent the next time you go online or do \"Send Unsent Messages\", a dialog pops up which allows you to specify when the message will be sent.\n\nYou can specify a specific time and date, or click \"15 mins later\", \"30 mins later\" or \"2 hours later\", or click \"Put in Outbox\" to get the built-in Thunderbird \"Send Later\" functionality (i.e., copy to Outbox).\n\nFor additional information, see the <a href=\"http://blog.kamens.us/send-later\" rel=\"nofollow\">user guide</a>.\n\nJoin the <a href=\"http://groups.google.com/group/send-later-users\" rel=\"nofollow\">mailing list</a>!\n\nSend Later uses <a href=\"http://sugarjs.com/\" rel=\"nofollow\">SugarJS</a> by Andrew Plummer. Thanks Andrew!","ro":"Schimbă comanda „Trimite mai târziu” (Ctrl+Shift+Return) din fereastra de compunere a mesajului: în loc ca mesajul să fie doar pus în dosarul „De trimis” pentru a fi trimis la următoarea operațiune de trimitere, fie când aplicația revine online fie la „Trimite mesajele neexpediate”, se va deschide o fereastra care permite programarea trimiterii mesajului.\n\nSe poate selecta fie o anumita dată/oră, fie „peste 15 minute”, „peste 30 minute” sau „peste 2 ore”, fie „Pune în „De trimis”” pentru a obține funcționalitatea implicită din Thunderbird pentru „Trimite mai târziu” (adică copiere în „De trimis”).\n\nPentru informații suplimentare, vezi: <a href=\"https://blog.kamens.us/send-later\" rel=\"nofollow\">ghidul utilizatorului</a>.\n\nÎnscrie-te în <a href=\"https://groups.google.com/group/send-later-users\" rel=\"nofollow\">lista de corespondență</a>!\n\nSend Later folosește <a href=\"https://sugarjs.com/\" rel=\"nofollow\">SugarJS</a> de Andrew Plummer. 5.6.0 for Thunderbird 60:</strong> (RECOMMENDED)\nMail Merge is fully compatible with Thunderbird 60. Please make sure to use version <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/thunderbird/addon/mail-merge/versions/5.6.0\" rel=\"nofollow\"><strong>5.6.0</strong></a>.\n\n<strong>Version 6.0.0 for Thunderbird 68:</strong>\nMail Merge is fully compatible with Thunderbird 68. Please make sure to use version <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/thunderbird/addon/mail-merge/versions/6.0.0\" rel=\"nofollow\"><strong>6.0.0</strong></a>.\n\nOtherwise: <a href=\"https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/thunderbird-add-ons-frequently-asked-questions#w_how-do-i-update-an-add-on\" rel=\"nofollow\">Check for Updates in the Add-ons Manager</a>\n\n\n----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n\n<strong>Description:</strong>\nIf you want to send a message to multiple recipients, there are a few common problems:\n\n1) When you add the recipients in the To field, the recipients will see each other. (You can work around this problem by adding the recipients in the Bcc field.)\n\n2) Most email providers limit the number of recipients in the To / Cc / Bcc field. (You can work around this problem by creating multiple messages.)\n\n3) You cannot personalize the message. (You cannot work around this problem.)\n\nYou can work around some of these problems, but especially the last problem cannot be solved without creating individual messages. Of course there are third party services, that help you to send newsletters; but you have to trust them.\n\nMail Merge solves these problems by creating individual messages for each recipient from a draft message - locally on your computer without the need to trust third party services!\n\n\n----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n\n<strong>Step by Step:</strong> (Address Book)\nScreenshots: <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205597.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Draft Message</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205598.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Draft Message</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205599.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Draft Message</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205618.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Mail Merge Dialog</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205624.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Preview Message Dialog</a>\n<ol><li>Create a New Message (\"File -&gt; New -&gt; Message\")</li><li>Add the Recipients to To or add the Variable(s) to To, e.g.: <em>{{PrimaryEmail}}</em> or <em>{{FirstName}} {{LastName}} &lt;{{PrimaryEmail}}&gt;</em></li><li>Add other Recipients to Cc (optional) (variables are supported)</li><li>Add other Recipients to Bcc (optional) (variables are supported)</li><li>Add the Subject (variables are supported)</li><li>Add the Body (variables are supported)</li><li>Add (global) Attachments (optional)</li><li>Click \"File -&gt; Mail Merge\"</li><li>Select \"Address Book\" and check \"Deliver Mode\"</li><li>Add (individual) Attachments (optional) (variables are supported)</li><li>Check \"Start\", \"Stop\" and \"Pause\" (optional)</li><li>Click \"OK\"</li></ol>The Draft Message is saved as Template in your Current Account and for each Recipient a New Message is automagically saved in your Outbox (\"Local Folders -&gt; Outbox\"). Ready for Delivery: \"File -&gt; Send Unsent Messages\"\n\n\n<strong>Step by Step:</strong> (CardBook)\nScreenshots: <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205597.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Draft Message</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205602.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Draft Message</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205603.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Draft Message</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205617.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Mail Merge Dialog</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205624.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Preview Message Dialog</a>\n<ol><li>Create a New Message (\"File -&gt; New -&gt; Message\")</li><li>Add the Recipients to To or add the Variable(s) to To, e.g.: <em>{{email}}</em> or <em>{{firstname}} {{lastname}} &lt;{{email}}&gt;</em></li><li>Add other Recipients to Cc (optional) (variables are supported)</li><li>Add other Recipients to Bcc (optional) (variables are supported)</li><li>Add the Subject (variables are supported)</li><li>Add the Body (variables are supported)</li><li>Add (global) Attachments (optional)</li><li>Click \"File -&gt; Mail Merge\"</li><li>Select \"CardBook\" and check \"Deliver Mode\"</li><li>Add (individual) Attachments (optional) (variables are supported)</li><li>Check \"Start\", \"Stop\" and \"Pause\" (optional)</li><li>Click \"OK\"</li></ol>The Draft Message is saved as Template in your Current Account and for each Recipient a New Message is automagically saved in your Outbox (\"Local Folders -&gt; Outbox\"). Ready for Delivery: \"File -&gt; Send Unsent Messages\"\n\n\n<strong>Step by Step:</strong> (CSV)\nScreenshots: <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205600.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Draft Message</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205601.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Draft Message</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205619.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Mail Merge Dialog</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205623.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Preview File Dialog</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205624.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Preview Message Dialog</a>\n<ol><li>Create a New Message (\"File -&gt; New -&gt; Message\")</li><li>Add the Variable(s) to To, e.g.: <em>{{Email}}</em> or <em>{{FirstName}} {{LastName}} &lt;{{Email}}&gt;</em></li><li>Add other Recipients to Cc (optional) (variables are supported)</li><li>Add other Recipients to Bcc (optional) (variables are supported)</li><li>Add the Subject (variables are supported)</li><li>Add the Body (variables are supported)</li><li>Add (global) Attachments (optional)</li><li>Click \"File -&gt; Mail Merge\"</li><li>Select \"CSV\" as \"Source\" and check \"Deliver Mode\"</li><li>Add (individual) Attachments (optional) (variables are supported)</li><li>Select the \"File\" and check \"Character Set\", \"Field Delimiter\" and \"Text Delimiter\"</li><li>Check \"Start\", \"Stop\" and \"Pause\" (optional)</li><li>Click \"OK\"</li></ol>The Draft Message is saved as Template in your Current Account and for each Recipient a New Message is automagically saved in your Outbox (\"Local Folders -&gt; Outbox\"). Ready for Delivery: \"File -&gt; Send Unsent Messages\"\n\n\n<strong>Step by Step:</strong> (JSON)\nScreenshots: <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205600.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Draft Message</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205601.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Draft Message</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205620.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Mail Merge Dialog</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205623.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Preview File Dialog</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205624.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Preview Message Dialog</a>\n<ol><li>Create a New Message (\"File -&gt; New -&gt; Message\")</li><li>Add the Variable(s) to To, e.g.: <em>{{Email}}</em> or <em>{{FirstName}} {{LastName}} &lt;{{Email}}&gt;</em></li><li>Add other Recipients to Cc (optional) (variables are supported)</li><li>Add other Recipients to Bcc (optional) (variables are supported)</li><li>Add the Subject (variables are supported)</li><li>Add the Body (variables are supported)</li><li>Add (global) Attachments (optional)</li><li>Click \"File -&gt; Mail Merge\"</li><li>Select \"JSON\" as \"Source\" and check \"Deliver Mode\"</li><li>Add (individual) Attachments (optional) (variables are supported)</li><li>Select the \"File\"</li><li>Check \"Start\", \"Stop\" and \"Pause\" (optional)</li><li>Click \"OK\"</li></ol>The Draft Message is saved as Template in your Current Account and for each Recipient a New Message is automagically saved in your Outbox (\"Local Folders -&gt; Outbox\"). Ready for Delivery: \"File -&gt; Send Unsent Messages\"\n\n\n<strong>Step by Step:</strong> (Spreadsheet)\nScreenshots: <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205600.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Draft Message</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205601.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Draft Message</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205621.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Mail Merge Dialog</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205623.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Preview File Dialog</a> | <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205624.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Preview Message Dialog</a>\n<ol><li>Create a New Message (\"File -&gt; New -&gt; Message\")</li><li>Add the Variable(s) to To, e.g.: <em>{{Email}}</em> or <em>{{FirstName}} {{LastName}} &lt;{{Email}}&gt;</em></li><li>Add other Recipients to Cc (optional) (variables are supported)</li><li>Add other Recipients to Bcc (optional) (variables are supported)</li><li>Add the Subject (variables are supported)</li><li>Add the Body (variables are supported)</li><li>Add (global) Attachments (optional)</li><li>Click \"File -&gt; Mail Merge\"</li><li>Select \"Spreadsheet\" as \"Source\" and check \"Deliver Mode\"</li><li>Add (individual) Attachments (optional) (variables are supported)</li><li>Select the \"File\" and check \"Sheet Name\"</li><li>Check \"Start\", \"Stop\" and \"Pause\" (optional)</li><li>Click \"OK\"</li></ol>The Draft Message is saved as a Template in your Current Account and for each Recipient a New Message is automagically saved in your Outbox (\"Local Folders -&gt; Outbox\"). Ready for Delivery: \"File -&gt; Send Unsent Messages\"\n\n\n----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n\n<strong>Tutorials:</strong> (External)\n\nChris Bryson has published two videos:\n<a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l8aOcsojVEo\" rel=\"nofollow\">How to Mail Merge with Thunderbird</a>\n<a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mcwJuyt_xnM\" rel=\"nofollow\">Mail Merge Attachments with Thunderbird Email</a>\n\nRaffael Herrmann has published a guide (German):\n<a href=\"https://code-bude.net/2016/11/04/serienmails-mit-thunderbird-erstellen/\" rel=\"nofollow\">Serienmails mit Thunderbird erstellen</a>\n\n\n----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n\n<strong>Deliver Mode:</strong>\nMail Merge supports \"Save as Draft\", \"Send Later\" (default) and \"Send Now\"  as \"Deliver Mode\" for the individual and personalized messages.\n\n<strong>Use \"Send Now\" as \"Deliver Mode\" at your own risk!</strong>\nIt is strongly recommended to use \"Send Later\" as \"Deliver Mode\" and to check the individual and personalized messages in the folder \"Local Folders -&gt; Outbox\". Bugs in Thunderbird, bugs in Mail Merge and bugs in other add-ons may lead to unexpected and undesired results.\n\n\n----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n\n<strong>Attachments:</strong> (Global)\nGlobal Attachments, i.e. attachments that are the same for every recipient, can be added normally using the toolbarbutton \"Attach\".\n\n\n<strong>Attachments:</strong> (Individual)\nIndividual Attachments, i.e. attachments that are different for every recipient, can be added in the \"Attachments\" field in the Mail Merge Dialog, e.g.:\n<code>{{Attachment}}</code>\n<code>C:\\Path\\To\\File\\{{Attachment}}</code>\n\nMultiple (individual) attachments can be separated by line breaks, e.g.:\n<code>C:\\Path\\To\\File\\{{Attachment1}}\nC:\\Path\\To\\File\\{{Attachment2}}\nC:\\Path\\To\\File\\{{Attachment3}}</code>\n\n\n----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n\n<strong>CSV:</strong>\n<a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comma-separated_values\" rel=\"nofollow\">Comma-separated values</a>\n<code>records are separated by line breaks (\\r, \\n, \\r\\n)\nfields are separated by field delimiters (comma, semicolon, colon, tab)\nfields may be enclosed within text delimiters (double quote, single quote, none)\nfields with embedded line breaks must be enclosed within text delimiters\nfields with embedded field delimiters must be enclosed within text delimiters\nfields with embedded text delimiters must be enclosed within text delimiters\nembedded text delimiters must be doubled\nfirst record must contain column names</code>\n\n\n<strong>CSV:</strong> (Example)\n<code>FirstName,LastName,Gender,Email,Attachment\nJohn,Doe,m,john.doe@example.com,C:\\MyFile.pdf</code>\n\n\n<strong>Character Set:</strong> (Recommendation)\n<a href=\"https://encoding.spec.whatwg.org/\" rel=\"nofollow\">Character Sets Supported by Thunderbird</a>\n<em>windows-1252</em> (Windows)\n<em>utf-8</em> (Linux &amp; Mac)\n\n\n----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n\n<strong>JSON:</strong> (Array of Arrays)\nMail Merge supports UTF-8 encoded files in JSON format with Array of Arrays.\n\n<strong>JSON:</strong> (Array of Arrays) (Example)\n<code>[\n[\"FirstName\",\"LastName\",\"Gender\",\"Email\",\"Attachment\"],\n[\"John\",\"Doe\",\"m\",\"john.doe@example.com\",\"C:\\\\MyFile.pdf\"]\n]</code>\n\n\n----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n\n<strong>Spreadsheet:</strong>\nSupport for spreadsheets is based on <a href=\"https://sheetjs.com/\" rel=\"nofollow\">SheetJS</a>. See: <a href=\"https://github.com/sheetjs/js-xlsx#file-formats\" rel=\"nofollow\">File Formats supported by SheetJS</a>\n\n\n----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n\n<strong>Batch:</strong> (Start, Stop and Pause)\n<em>Start</em>: Number of the First Message (optional)\n<em>Stop</em>: Number of the Last Message (optional)\n<em>Pause</em>: Pause between Messages in Seconds (optional) (variables are supported)\n\n\n<strong>Pause:</strong> (Advanced)\nThe \"Pause\" field supports fixed and random pauses as well as variables, e.g.:\nFixed Pause: <em>10</em> (Pause 10 seconds)\nRandom Pause: <em>10-60</em> (Pause between 10 and 60 seconds)\nVariables: <em>{{Pause}}</em>\n\n\n----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n\n<strong>Send Later:</strong>\nMail Merge supports <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/addon/send-later-3\" rel=\"nofollow\">Send Later</a>:\n<a href=\"http://blog.kamens.us/send-later#mailmerge\" rel=\"nofollow\">User Guide</a>\n\n\n----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n\n<strong>Line Breaks:</strong>\nThunderbird uses an HTML editor internally. You can create line breaks with &lt;br&gt;.\n\n\n<strong>Links and Images:</strong>\nThunderbird uses an HTML editor internally. You can create (individual) links and (individual) images with \"Insert -&gt; HTML\", e.g.:\nLink: <em>&lt;a href=\"{{link}}\"&gt;</em>\nImage: <em>&lt;img src=\"{{image}}\"&gt;</em>\n\n\n----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n\n<strong>Preview File Dialog:</strong>\nScreenshot: <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205623.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Preview File Dialog</a>\nThe \"Preview File Dialog\" offers you the chance to briefly check the file, i.e. CSV, JSON or Spreadsheet. <strong>It is no adequate compensation for inspecting the files themselves!</strong>\n\n\n<strong>Preview Message Dialog:</strong>\nScreenshot: <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205624.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Preview Message Dialog</a>\nThe \"Preview Message Dialog\" offers you the chance to briefly check the messages. <strong>It is no adequate compensation for inspecting the individual and personalized messages themselves!</strong>\n\n\n----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n\n<strong>Deliver Mode Warning</strong>\nScreenshot: <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205632.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Deliver Mode Warning</a>\n<strong>Use \"Send Now\" as \"Deliver Mode\" at your own risk!</strong>\nIt is strongly recommended to use \"Send Later\" as \"Deliver Mode\" and to check the individual and personalized messages in the folder \"Local Folders -&gt; Outbox\". Bugs in Thunderbird, bugs in Mail Merge and bugs in other add-ons may lead to unexpected and undesired results.\n\n\n<strong>Recipients Reminder:</strong>\nScreenshot: <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205625.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Recipients Reminder</a>\nThe \"Recipients Reminder\" shall prevent accidentally clicking on \"Send Now\" or \"Send Later\". To start Mail Merge please click \"Cancel\" and use the menu \"File -&gt; Mail Merge\" or the toolbarbutton \"Mail Merge\". The \"Recipients Reminder\" can be activated and deactivated in the Mail Merge Options (\"Tools -&gt; Add-ons Preferences -&gt; Mail Merge\"). Threshold: <em>extensions.mailmerge.recipients</em>\n\n\n<strong>Variables Reminder:</strong>\nScreenshot: <a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/user-media/previews/full/205/205626.png\" rel=\"nofollow\">Variables Reminder</a>\nThe \"Variables Reminder\" shall prevent accidentally clicking on \"Send Now\" or \"Send Later\". To start Mail Merge please click \"Cancel\" and use the menu \"File -&gt; Mail Merge\" or the toolbarbutton \"Mail Merge\". The \"Variables Reminder\" can be activated and deactivated in the Mail Merge Options (\"Tools -&gt; Add-ons Preferences -&gt; Mail Merge\").\n\n\n----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n\n<strong>Variable:</strong> <em>{{name}}</em>\nThe variable will be replaced by the value of the field <em>name</em>, e.g.:\n<em>{{FirstName}}</em>: the variable will be replaced by the value of the field <em>FirstName</em>\n<em>{{LastName}}</em>: the variable will be replaced by the value of the field <em>LastName</em>\n<em>{{PrimaryEmail}}</em>: the variable will be replaced by the value of the field <em>PrimaryEmail</em>\n\n<strong>Variable:</strong> <em>{{name|if|then}}</em>\nIf the value of the field <em>name</em> equals <em>if</em>, then the variable will be replaced by <em>then</em>.\n\n<strong>Variable:</strong> <em>{{name|if|then|else}}</em>\nIf the value of the field <em>name</em> equals <em>if</em>, then the variable will be replaced by <em>then</em>, else by <em>else</em>.\n\n\n<strong>Variable:</strong> <em>{{name|*|if|then|else}}</em> (includes)\nIf the value of the field <em>name</em> <em>includes</em> <em>if</em>, then the variable will be replaced by <em>then</em>, else by <em>else</em>.\n\n<strong>Variable:</strong> <em>{{name|^|if|then|else}}</em> (starts with)\nIf the value of the field <em>name</em> <em>starts with</em> <em>if</em>, then the variable will be replaced by <em>then</em>, else by <em>else</em>.\n\n<strong>Variable:</strong> <em>{{name|$|if|then|else}}</em> (ends with)\nIf the value of the field <em>name</em> <em>ends with</em> <em>if</em>, then the variable will be replaced by <em>then</em>, else by <em>else</em>.\n\n\n<strong>Variable:</strong> <em>{{name|==|if|then|else}}</em> (equal to) (number)\nIf the value of the field <em>name</em> is <em>equal to</em> <em>if</em>, then the variable will be replaced by <em>then</em>, else by <em>else</em>.\n\n<strong>Variable:</strong> <em>{{name|&gt;|if|then|else}}</em> (greater than) (number)\nIf the value of the field <em>name</em> is <em>greater than</em> <em>if</em>, then the variable will be replaced by <em>then</em>, else by <em>else</em>.\n\n<strong>Variable:</strong> <em>{{name|&gt;=|if|then|else}}</em> (greater than or equal to) (number)\nIf the value of the field <em>name</em> is <em>greater than or equal to</em> <em>if</em>, then the variable will be replaced by <em>then</em>, else by <em>else</em>.\n\n<strong>Variable:</strong> <em>{{name|&lt;|if|then|else}}</em> (less than) (number)\nIf the value of the field <em>name</em> is <em>less than</em> <em>if</em>, then the variable will be replaced by <em>then</em>, else by <em>else</em>.\n\n<strong>Variable:</strong> <em>{{name|&lt;=|if|then|else}}</em> (less than or equal to) (number)\nIf the value of the field <em>name</em> is <em>less than or equal to</em> <em>if</em>, then the variable will be replaced by <em>then</em>, else by <em>else</em>.\n\n\n<strong>Nested Variables:</strong>\nVariables can be nested. For example: To create individual emails only for your premium customers, you can add something like this in the To field:\n{{Premium|x|{{Email}}}}\n\n\n<strong>Warning:</strong> (Variables in the From / To / Cc / Bcc / Reply fields)\nAdvanced variables like \"includes\", \"starts with\" and \"ends with\" as well as the \"numbers\" may not work as expected in the From / To / Cc / Bcc / Reply fields!\n\n\n----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n\n<strong>Address Book:</strong>\n<a href=\"https://dxr.mozilla.org/comm-central/source/comm/mailnews/addrbook/public/nsIAbCard.idl\" rel=\"nofollow\">Addressbook Properties Supported by Thunderbird</a>\n<code><em>{{FirstName}}</em>\n<em>{{LastName}}</em>\n<em>{{DisplayName}}</em>\n<em>{{NickName}}</em>\n<em>{{PrimaryEmail}}</em>\n<em>{{SpouseName}}</em>\n<em>{{FamilyName}}</em>\n<em>{{SecondEmail}}</em>\n<em>{{HomeAddress}}</em>\n<em>{{HomeAddress2}}</em>\n<em>{{HomeCity}}</em>\n<em>{{HomeState}}</em>\n<em>{{HomeZipCode}}</em>\n<em>{{HomeCountry}}</em>\n<em>{{WebPage2}}</em>\n<em>{{WorkAddress}}</em>\n<em>{{WorkAddress2}}</em>\n<em>{{WorkCity}}</em>\n<em>{{WorkState}}</em>\n<em>{{WorkZipCode}}</em>\n<em>{{WorkCountry}}</em>\n<em>{{WebPage1}}</em>\n<em>{{HomePhone}}</em>\n<em>{{WorkPhone}}</em>\n<em>{{FaxNumber}}</em>\n<em>{{PagerNumber}}</em>\n<em>{{CellularNumber}}</em>\n<em>{{JobTitle}}</em>\n<em>{{Department}}</em>\n<em>{{Company}}</em>\n<em>{{Custom1}}</em>\n<em>{{Custom2}}</em>\n<em>{{Custom3}}</em>\n<em>{{Custom4}}</em>\n<em>{{Notes}}</em>\n<em>{{AnniversaryYear}}</em>\n<em>{{AnniversaryMonth}}</em>\n<em>{{AnniversaryDay}}</em>\n<em>{{BirthYear}}</em>\n<em>{{BirthMonth}}</em>\n<em>{{BirthDay}}</em>\n<em>{{_AimScreenName}}</em>\n<em>{{_GoogleTalk}}</em>\n<em>{{_Yahoo}}</em>\n<em>{{_Skype}}</em>\n<em>{{_QQ}}</em>\n<em>{{_MSN}}</em>\n<em>{{_ICQ}}</em>\n<em>{{_JabberId}}</em>\n<em>{{_IRC}}</em></code>\n\n\n<strong>Address Book:</strong>\n<a href=\"https://freeshell.de/~kaosmos/morecols-en.html\" rel=\"nofollow\">MoreFunctionsForAddressBook</a>\n<code><em>{{MFFABcustom1}}</em>\n<em>{{MFFABcustom2}}</em>\n<em>{{MFFABcustom3}}</em>\n<em>{{MFFABcustom4}}</em>\n<em>{{MFFABcustom5}}</em>\n<em>{{MFFABcustom6}}</em>\n<em>{{MFFABcustom7}}</em>\n<em>{{MFFABcustom8}}</em>\n<em>{{MFFABcustom9}}</em>\n<em>{{MFFABcustom10}}</em>\n<em>{{MFFABemail1}}</em>\n<em>{{MFFABemail2}}</em>\n<em>{{MFFABemail3}}</em>\n<em>{{MFFABemail4}}</em>\n<em>{{MFFABemail5}}</em></code>\n\n\n<strong>Address Book:</strong>\n<a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/addon/gcontactsync/\" rel=\"nofollow\">gContactSync</a>\n<code><em>{{ThirdEmail}}</em>\n<em>{{FourthEmail}}</em>\n<em>{{HomeFaxNumber}}</em>\n<em>{{OtherNumber}}</em>\n<em>{{PrimaryEmailType}}</em>\n<em>{{SecondEmailType}}</em>\n<em>{{ThirdEmailType}}</em>\n<em>{{FourthEmailType}}</em>\n<em>{{WorkPhoneType}}</em>\n<em>{{HomePhoneType}}</em>\n<em>{{FaxNumberType}}</em>\n<em>{{CellularNumberType}}</em>\n<em>{{PagerNumberType}}</em>\n<em>{{HomeFaxNumberType}}</em>\n<em>{{OtherNumberType}}</em>\n<em>{{WebPage1Type}}</em>\n<em>{{WebPage2Type}}</em>\n<em>{{Relation0}}</em>\n<em>{{Relation1}}</em>\n<em>{{Relation2}}</em>\n<em>{{Relation3}}</em>\n<em>{{Relation4}}</em>\n<em>{{Relation5}}</em>\n<em>{{Relation0Type}}</em>\n<em>{{Relation1Type}}</em>\n<em>{{Relation2Type}}</em>\n<em>{{Relation3Type}}</em>\n<em>{{Relation4Type}}</em>\n<em>{{Relation5Type}}</em></code>\n\n\n----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n\n<strong>CardBook:</strong>\n<a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/addon/cardbook/\" rel=\"nofollow\">CardBook</a>\n<code><em>{{dirPrefId}}</em>\n<em>{{cardurl}}</em>\n<em>{{etag}}</em>\n<em>{{updated}}</em>\n<em>{{deleted}}</em>\n<em>{{created}}</em>\n<em>{{lastname}}</em>\n<em>{{firstname}}</em>\n<em>{{othername}}</em>\n<em>{{prefixname}}</em>\n<em>{{suffixname}}</em>\n<em>{{fn}}</em>\n<em>{{nickname}}</em>\n<em>{{bday}}</em>\n<em>{{gender}}</em>\n<em>{{adr}}</em>\n<em>{{tel}}</em>\n<em>{{email}}</em>\n<em>{{mailer}}</em>\n<em>{{tz}}</em>\n<em>{{geo}}</em>\n<em>{{title}}</em>\n<em>{{role}}</em>\n<em>{{agent}}</em>\n<em>{{org}}</em>\n<em>{{categories}}</em>\n<em>{{note}}</em>\n<em>{{prodid}}</em>\n<em>{{sortstring}}</em>\n<em>{{uid}}</em>\n<em>{{rev}}</em>\n<em>{{url}}</em>\n<em>{{version}}</em>\n<em>{{class1}}</em>\n<em>{{key}}</em>\n<em>{{impp}}</em>\n<em>{{others}}</em>\n<em>{{photo}}</em>\n<em>{{value}}</em>\n<em>{{localURI}}</em>\n<em>{{URI}}</em>\n<em>{{extension}}</em>\n<em>{{logo}}</em>\n<em>{{value}}</em>\n<em>{{localURI}}</em>\n<em>{{URI}}</em>\n<em>{{extension}}</em>\n<em>{{sound}}</em>\n<em>{{value}}</em>\n<em>{{localURI}}</em>\n<em>{{URI}}</em>\n<em>{{extension}}</em>\n<em>{{kind}}</em>\n<em>{{member}}</em>\n<em>{{dispn}}</em>\n<em>{{dispadr}}</em>\n<em>{{disphomeadr}}</em>\n<em>{{dispworkadr}}</em>\n<em>{{disptel}}</em>\n<em>{{disphometel}}</em>\n<em>{{dispworktel}}</em>\n<em>{{dispcelltel}}</em>\n<em>{{dispemail}}</em>\n<em>{{disphomeemail}}</em>\n<em>{{dispworkemail}}</em>\n<em>{{dispimpp}}</em>\n<em>{{dispurl}}</em>\n<em>{{pgname}}</em>\n<em>{{pg}}</em></code>\n\n\n<strong>CardBook:</strong> (Address)\n<a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/addon/cardbook/\" rel=\"nofollow\">CardBook</a>\n<code><em> {{adr}}</em>\n<em>{{adrpostoffice}}</em>\n<em>{{adrextended}}</em>\n<em>{{adrstreet}}</em>\n<em>{{adrlocality}}</em>\n<em>{{adrregion}}</em>\n<em>{{adrpostalcode}}</em>\n<em>{{adrcountry}}</em></code>\n\n\n<strong>CardBook:</strong> (Types)\n<a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/addon/cardbook/\" rel=\"nofollow\">CardBook</a>\nThe configured \"Types\" in the \"CardBook Preferences\" can be used by its \"Code\" as a first parameter for the properties address, email, impp, phone and url. For example:\n<code><em>{{adr#home}}</em>\n<em>{{adr#work}}</em>\n<em>{{email#home}}</em>\n<em>{{email#work}}</em>\n<em>{{impp#home}}</em>\n<em>{{impp#work}}</em>\n<em>{{tel#cell}}</em>\n<em>{{tel#fax}}</em>\n<em>{{tel#home}}</em>\n<em>{{tel#work}}</em>\n<em>{{url#home}}</em>\n<em>{{url#work}}</em></code>\n\nIn case you have multiple entries, you can use a number as a second parameter for the properties address, email, impp, phone and url. For example:\n<code><em>{{url#home#0}}</em>\n<em>{{url#home#1}}</em>\n<em>{{url#home#2}}</em></code>\n\n\n<strong>CardBook:</strong> (Custom Fields)\n<a href=\"https://addons.thunderbird.net/addon/cardbook/\" rel=\"nofollow\">CardBook</a>\nThe configured \"Custom Fields\" in the \"CardBook Preferences\" can be used by its \"Field Name\". For example:\n<code><em>{{others#X-CUSTOM1}}</em>\n<em>{{others#X-CUSTOM2}}</em>\n<em>{{others#X-CUSTOM3}}</em>\n<em>{{others#X-CUSTOM4}}</em></code>\n\n\n----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n\n<strong>Custom Headers:</strong>\nMail Merge supports <a href=\"http://kb.mozillazine.org/Custom_headers\" rel=\"nofollow\">Custom Headers</a>: \n<em>mail.compose.other.header</em>\n\n\n----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n\n<strong>Debug:</strong>\nView Log Messages in the Error Console (\"Tools -&gt; Developer Tools -&gt; Error Console\")\n\n\n----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n\n<strong>Error Mailredirect extension for Mozilla Thunderbird and Mozilla SeaMonkey adds the ability to redirect one or more email messages to one or more recipients.\nThe feature of email redirecting is also known as remailing or resending.\nThe extension is an answer for <a href=\"https://bugzil.la/12916\" title=\"Bug 12916 - Allow bounce/redirect of mail messages\" rel=\"nofollow\">bug 12916</a>\n\nNot all email providers support redirection of messages. Most notably Microsoft does not support it at the moment, probably as a measure against SPAM. I think they do this in error, and also reported this to Microsoft, but unfortunately they haven't changed their policy yet.\n\nIf you run into issues with an email provider not supporting redirection of messages, please contact them and see if you can make them change their policy. You can point them to this add-on, <a href=\"https://bugzil.la/12916\" title=\"Bug 12916 - Allow bounce/redirect of mail messages\" rel=\"nofollow\">bug 12916</a>, or <a href=\"https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2822.txt\" rel=\"nofollow\">RFC2822</a> section 3.6.6.\n\nAs a workaround you can also redirect your messages through another email provider, e.g. Gmail, but this isn't always desirable, because then that email provider gains access to the messages you redirect, and those messages might contain sensitive information.","nl":"De Mailredirect-extensie voor Mozilla Thunderbird en Mozilla SeaMonkey voegt de mogelijkheid om een of meerdere berichten te heradresseren naar een of meerdere ontvangers toe.\nDe functie van e-mail heradresseren wordt ook wel remailen genoemd.\nDe extensie is een antwoord op <a href=\"https://bugzil.la/12916\" title=\"Bug 12916 - Allow bounce/redirect of mail messages\" rel=\"nofollow\">bug 12916</a>.","hu":"Üzenet átirányítás extension for Thunderbird has the aim to improve the printing layout of the mails, with the following features:\n\n- it gives the possibility to have the date of the message in a format similar to the one used in messages panel;\n- it can also modify deeply the view of the attachments' list, inserting it in the headers, just after the recipients;\n- it can add a border arorund the headers;\n- it can hide the headers;\n- it can truncate the headers' lines too long;\n- it can hide the images in the message;\n- it can hide the inline attachments in printing, even if you view them by default;\n- it can add the user name before the headers;\n- it can delete the card header in addressbook (\"Card for\");\n- it can print contacts with just name and email address;\n- it can print addressbook with small fonts. The default value is 10 pixel, but you can change it as you wish;\n- it can use a compact format to print from addressbook (with this option and the others you can save up to 40% of paper);\n- it can print just selected part of a message;\n- it can apply a style (color and size) to the quoted text;\n- it can give more options in printing addressbook;\n- it can use a font family and a font size in printing messages (for the whole message or just for headers);\n- it can hide always extended headers; - it can modify headers order;\n- it can set a maximum length for the text lines (default value = 90 characters). This is useful to prevent that very long text lines without newline characters can break the print layout. \n\nMoreover it gives you a fast access to two native functions of Thunderbird, pringing without progress bar and without the printer dialog.\nIt deletes also automatically in printing the .doc and .rtf attachments wrongly displayed inline, because of a wrong content-type in the message.\n\nYou can modify the settings for messages in main window from File --&gt; Printing options and the settings for addressbook from addressbook window in File --&gt; Printing options.\n\nHow print just selection in a message: go in File --&gt; Printing options in main window and enable this option. After, select a part of the message and click on \"Print\" or \"Print preview\".","it":"Questa estensione per Thunderbird ha lo scopo di migliorare il layout di stampa dei messaggi e della rubrica, con le seguenti opzioni:\n\n- dà la possibilità di avere la data nello stesso formato usato nel pannello dei messaggi;\n- può modificare completamente la visualizzazione dell'elenco degli allegati, inserendolo nelle intestazioni del messaggio subito dopo i destinatari;\n- può racchiudere l'intestazione in un bordo;\n- può nascondere l'intestazione;\n- può tagliare le linee dell'intestazione troppo lunghe;\n- può nascondere le immagini nei messaggi;\n- può nascondere gli allegati in linea nella stampa, anche se è impostata la loro visualizzazione;\n- può aggiungere il nome dell'utente prima delle intestazioni;\n- può eliminare l'intestazione delle schede della rubrica (\"Scheda per\");\n- può inserire nella stampa dei contatti solo il nome e l'indirizzo email;\n- può stampare la rubrica in caratteri piccoli. Il default è 10 pixel, ma il valore può essere cambiato secondo le esigenze;\n- può stampare la rubrica con un formato più compatto (questa opzione può fare risparmiare, in combinazione con le altre, fino al 40% di carta);\n- può stampare solo la parte di messaggio selezionato;\n- può applicare uno stile alle citazioni (colore e grandezza);\n- può aggiungere alcune opzioni nella stampa della rubrica;\n- può far scegliere il font e la grandezza nella stampa dei messaggi (tutto il messaggio o solo le intestazioni);\n- può ridurre le intestazioni nella stampa, quando si usa la visualizzazione estesa;\n- consente di modificare l'ordine delle intestazioni;\n- può limitare la lunghezza delle righe di testo a una certa lunghezza (valore di default = 90 caratteri). Questa opzione è utile per evitare che righe troppo lunghe senza a capo rovinino il layout della stampa. \n\nInoltre dà la posssibilità di controllare facilmente due opzioni native di Thunderbrid, relative alla barra di avanzamento e al dialogo di stampa.\nL'estensione infine elimina automaticamente dalla stampa gli allegati .doc e .rtf erroneamente visualizzati in linea, a causa dell'errato content-type nel messaggio.\n\nLe opzioni per la stampa dei messaggi sono raggiungibili nella finestra principale da File --&gt; Opzioni stampa.\nLe opzioni per la stampa della rubrica e dei contatti sono raggiungibili nella finestra della rubrica da File --&gt; Opzioni stampa.\n\nCome stampare solo la parte selezionata del messaggio: andare in File --&gt; Opzioni stampa nella finestra principale e attivare l'opzione relativa a questo. Dopo di che selezionare la parte che si vuole stampare nella finestra principale o nella finestra del messaggio e premere \"Stampa\" o \"Anteprima di stampa\".\n\nPer maggiori informazioni, visitare il sito <a rel=\"nofollow\" Or You can build it on Your own, it is simple.\n\nWählen Sie einfach \"Andere Vorlage...\" aus dem Drop-Down-Menü der Schaltflächen \"Neue Nachricht\", \"Antwort*\" und \"Weiterleiten\".\n\nAls Vorlage können Sie die Briefpapier-Dateien von MS OE nutzen, oder eigene erstellen.\n\nFür Anregungen oder Fehler benutzen Sie bitte folgende Addresse (auf Englisch): arivald@interia.pl\n\nStationery arbeitet nun mit dem <a href=\"https://addons.mozilla.org/thunderbird/addon/324497/\" rel=\"nofollow\">SmartTemplate4</a> Add-on, zusammen, um eine noch vollständigere Leistung bieten zu können. SmartTemplate4 erlaubt es nicht nur das Design anzupassen, sondern auch die Informationen aus dem e-Mail Header zu verwenden.\nDetails zu dem SmartTemplate4 Add-on sind auf Add-on-Seite oder auf der <a href=\"http://smarttemplate4.mozdev.org/stationery.html\" rel=\"nofollow\">Support-Seite für die Stationery Integration</a> zu finden.","en-US":"<strong>There is a version for TB 60 already</strong>, it was sent for review and publishing two months ago. But TB team fail to do the review, thus new version couldn't be downloaded here or updated automatically in TB.\n<strong>You can download it and install manually</strong>, from <a href=\"https://github.com/arivald/tbirdExt/raw/master/xpi%20archive/stationery-1.0.0.xpi\" rel=\"nofollow\">GitHub</a>. Or You can build it on Your own, it is simple.\n\nSimply use drop-down menu from buttons <strong>Write</strong>, <strong>Reply*</strong> and <strong>Forward</strong>, and select <strong>Other Stationery...</strong> option.\n\nAs template you may use template files from MS Outlook Express. Or you may write one.\n\nBy default, last used template become default one. It incorporates idea: Last time used template is probably most liked one. It make all templates sorted, most recently used going on top.\n\nBut You can change default behavior: simply go to <strong>Tools</strong> / <strong>Stationery options</strong>, tab <strong>Options</strong>, and un-check <strong>Enable automatic templates management</strong> checkbox. From now, <strong>Stationery</strong> will not update your list of templates, so default one will stay default until you change it manually in <strong>Stationery options</strong>.\n\nStationery now also works in cooperation with the <a href=\"https://addons.mozilla.org/thunderbird/addon/324497/\" rel=\"nofollow\">SmartTemplate4</a> Add-on, to provide an even richer and better experience. SmartTemplate4 allows you to customize your templates beyond just design, by inserting information from the mail header. Read details on the SmartTemplate4 Add-on page or on its <a href=\"http://smarttemplate4.mozdev.org/stationery.html\" rel=\"nofollow\">Support Page for Stationery integration</a>.","zh-CN":"<strong>There is a version for TB 60 already</strong>, it was sent for review and publishing two months ago. Or You can build it on Your own, it is simple.\n\n只要使用 撰写、回复和转发按钮上的下拉菜单，然后选择“其它信纸...”。\n\n您可以使用MS Outlook Express中的模板文件作为模板，或者自己写一个。\n\n默认情况下会使用最近使用的模板作为默认值，这纳入了以下想法：最近使用的模板很可能是您最喜爱的。所有模板都被有序的排列，最近使用的模板在最上方。\n\n您可以修改默认行为：只要前往 工具/信纸选项，标签选项，并取消“自动管理模板”选项。之后Stationery将不会更新您的模板列表，这样在您从Stationery选项中手动修改之前，默认模板将一直作为默认值。","sl":"<strong>There is a version for TB 60 already</strong>, it was sent for review and publishing two months ago. Or You can build it on Your own, it is simple.\n\nPreprosto uporabite spustni meni gumbov Sestavi, Odgovori in Posreduj, in izberite \"Druga predloga ...\".\n\nKot predloge lahko uporabite datoteke predlog iz programa MS Outlook Express. Ali pa lahko eno napišete.\n\nPrivzeto nazadnje uporabljena predloga postane privzeta. Vključuje idejo: nazadnje uporabljena predloga je verjetno najljubša. Vse predloge so razvrščene, z nazadnje uporabljeno postavljeno na vrh.\n\nToda privzeto obnašanje lahko spremenite: preprosto pojdite na Orodja / Možnosti Stationery, Možnosti zavihkov, in odznačite nastavitev \"Samodejno upravljaj s predlogami\". Od zdaj naprej Stationery ne be več posodabljal seznama predlog, tako da bo privzeta predloga ostala privzeta, dokler je ročno ne spremenite v možnostih Stationery.\n\nStationary sedaj sodeluje tudi z dodatkom <a href=\"https://addons.mozilla.org/thunderbird/addon/324497/\" rel=\"nofollow\">SmartTemplate4</a>, da vam priskrbi še bogatejšo in boljšo izkušnjo. SmartTemplate vam omogoča prilagoditev vaših predlog onstran oblikovanja, z vnašanjem podatkov iz glav sporočil. Preberite si podrobnosti na <a href=\"http://smarttemplate4.mozdev.org/stationery.html\" rel=\"nofollow\">strani dodatka SmartTemplate4 ali na njegovi podporni strani za povezovanje s Stationary</a>.","pl":"<strong>Istnieje już wersja Stationery dla TB 60</strong>, została przesłana do recenzji i opublikowania dwa miesiące temu. Zespół TB nie zrobił recenzji, dlatego nowa wersja nie może być pobrana tutaj lub zaktualizowana automatycznie w TB.\n<strong>Możesz nową wersję zainstalować ręcznie</strong>, z <a href=\"https://github.com/arivald/tbirdExt/raw/master/xpi%20archive/stationery-1.0.0.xpi\" rel=\"nofollow\">GitHuba</a>. Lub po prostu zbudować ze źródeł.\n\nPo prostu użyj rozwijanego menu z przycisków <strong>Napisz</strong>, <strong>Odpowiedz*</strong> lub <strong>Przekaż</strong>, i wybierz opcję  <strong>Inna papeteria...</strong>.\n\nJako papeterię możesz użyć papeterię z Outlook Expressa. \nMożesz też utworzyć nową, w pliku HTML.\n\nDomyślnie ostatnio użyta papeteria staje się papeterią domyślną. To odzwierciedla ideę: Ostatnio użyta jest prawdopodobnie najbardziej potrzebna. W efekcie lista papeterii jest posortowana of najbardziej potrzebnej do najmniej potrzebnej.\n\nAle oczywiście możesz to zmieć w opcjach, i ustalić stałą kolejność papeterii.\n\n\nDodatek Stationery może także współdziałać z dodatkiem <a href=\"https://addons.mozilla.org/thunderbird/addon/324497/\" rel=\"nofollow\">SmartTemplate4</a>, w celu zwiększenia możliwości papeterii. SmartTemplate4 pozwala na dostosowanie papeterii poza wygląd i design. Posta Elettronica Certificata (PEC) nasce per sostituire il servizio di posta raccomandata nella comunicazione tra i professionisti, i cittadini e le istituzioni rendendo più efficiente il meccanismo di comunicazione. Il sistema, basandosi sullo standard S/MIME, certifica lo scambio di documenti tra il mittente e il destinatario della comunicazione e informa automaticamente il mittente sullo stato della comunicazione fornendo ricevute che hanno valenza legale.\n\nThunderPEC si propone come strumento per la gestione semplificata della posta elettronica certificata in Thunderbird e può essere abilitato selettivamente sui soli account PEC.\n\nUn messaggio di posta elettronica certificata è costituito da una Busta di Trasporto che contiene il messaggio di posta elettronica originale inviato dal mittente ed un allegato XML che riassume i dati della transazione. La busta di trasporto è firmata digitalmente dal gestore PEC sorgente. \n\nThunderPEC visualizza direttamente il messaggio di posta elettronica originale e offre gli strumenti per poter operare sul messaggio originale. Inoltre, gestisce le notifiche PEC inviate dai gestori PEC coinvolti nella transazione. \n\nThunderPEC semplifica la gestione delle <b>notifiche PEC</b> e delle <b>ricevute <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/a3c6fc477c3d56c1ce635eb5e5c9cea47e41f6749e6fc96bf12e54828b4d5dc3/https%3A//it.wikipedia.org/wiki/Processo_civile_telematico_%2528diritto_italiano%2529\">PCT</a> e FatturaPA</b>, attraverso la funzionalità <b>Stato del messaggio</b> che permette di avere una visione di insieme/riassuntiva delle notifiche associate ad un messaggio inviato.\n\nThunderPEC introduce <b>tre filtri rapidi (Messaggi, Notifiche, 53/94)</b> che permettono la selezione rapida dei soli messaggi PEC, delle sole notifiche PEC o dei messaggi PEC conenenti notifiche secondo la Legge 53/94.\n\nThunderPEC  implementa, inoltre, le seguenti funzionalità:\n<ul><li><b>Archiviazione delle notifiche PEC e ricevute PCT/FatturaPA</b> che offre la possibilità di salvare le notifiche PEC associate ad un messaggio, le ricevute PCT/FatturaPA ed il messaggio stesso all'interno di un file zip per l'archiviazione.</li><li><b>Cerca PA</b> per ricercare l'indirizzo PEC di un ufficio pubblico sull'infrastruttura Open Data di DigitPA (<a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/9d934bb98932984ad82f8b8826247a60b2de29421d8a6297c988ad8f1b63e1a6/http%3A//spcdata.digitpa.gov.it\">spcdata.digitpa.gov.it</a>).</li><li><b>Trasferisci Account</b> per trasferire i dati di un account PEC da <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/ea007840c341b208b928e4cf637e3f81a4cf22ab9f398d24e6f638cd10e8c30a/http%3A//youtu.be/uuN8pQqERek\">ThunderPEC a PocketPEC</a>.</li></ul>\nThunderPEC introduce, all'interno del menu principale, il menu ThunderPEC, composto da:\n1) <b>Account</b>: per la gestione degli account PEC.\n1.a) <b>Aggiungi</b>: per aggiungere un nuovo account PEC. Semplifica la creazione di un nuovo account per i gestori preconfigurati (Aruba PEC, Legalmail, Postecert, Vodafone PEC, Telecom Italia PEC, PostaCertificat@, <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/afcc9568ec003fd863fbbd3c1b6158799dba50374d2534584496d6acf6e8fba9/http%3A//pec.istruzione.it\">pec.istruzione.it</a>, <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/0fc0aefbf2df361fdd461c2fdba4bf5ba2722e92c7d8befef18f462c9dc74a97/http%3A//pec.notariato.it\">pec.notariato.it</a>, <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/d24ab283c097c02ae95a181a4ee0c25bc1022853cb0b06f106ce12a2541b5f01/http%3A//postacertificata.notariato.it\">postacertificata.notariato.it</a>). \n1.b) <b>Seleziona</b>: per abilitare/disabilitare ThunderPEC sugli account già esistenti.\n2) <b>Tipo di ricevuta</b>: per selezionare il tipo di ricevuta di consegna desiderata.\n3) <b>P7M</b>: per attivare/disattivare la funzionalità per la correzione del bug sugli allegati p7m di Thunderbird.\n4) <b>PocketPEC</b>: per trasferire un account PEC da ThunderPEC a PocketPEC in modalità keyless.\n5) <b>Condividi/Seguici</b>: per l'interazione attraverso i social network (ad esempio, Facebook, Twitter).\n6) <b>Aiuto</b>: per visualizzare la guida.\n7) <b>Invia email al supporto</b>: per inviare un email al supporto di ThunderPEC.\n8) <b>Informazioni su ThunderPEC</b>: per visualizzare la versione dell'estensione e ulteriori informazioni aggiuntive.\n\nInoltre, per poter operare direttamente sul messaggio originale contenuto all'interno di un messaggio PEC e gestire i dati di certificazione e le ricevute, ThunderPEC aggiunge i seguenti elementi:\n\na) Il sottomenu ThunderPEC al menu Messaggio di Thunderbird\nb) Il sottomenu ThunderPEC all'interno del menu contestuale\nc) La toolbar di gestione all'interno della finestra del messaggio\nd) Il menu Thunderpec all'interno della finestra di composizione di un nuovo messaggio\n\nBLOG: <a rel=\"nofollow\"
