réactions ! Cliquez sur le lien ci-dessus :-)</b>\n\nThunderbird Conversations est une extension pour Thunderbird qui comme son nom l'indique affiche vos courriers en mode conversation. Les fonctions les plus sympas sont les suivantes :\n- la vue en conversation classique qui récupère les messages de tous les dossiers, à la manière de Gmail ;\n- l'intégration de <a href=\"https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/thunderbird/addon/243985/\" rel=\"nofollow\">Thunderbird Contacts</a> : les participants sont repérables par une infobulle, qui comprend leur avatar et profil de Facebook, Twitter…\n- la réponse rapide, avec l'autocomplétion qui vous permet de dire votre mot dans une discussion en un clin d'œil\n- les citations masquées qui améliorent la lisibilité\n- les raccourcis-clavier,\n- et quelques astuces supplémentaires à découvrir.","en-US":"<a href=\"https://github.com/protz/thunderbird-conversations/wiki\" rel=\"nofollow\"><b>Website</b> (including documentation)</a> - <a href=\"https://github.com/protz/thunderbird-conversations/wiki/FAQ\" rel=\"nofollow\">FAQ</a> - <a href=\"https://github.com/protz/thunderbird-conversations/issues\" rel=\"nofollow\">Report bugs</a> - <a href=\"https://github.com/protz/thunderbird-conversations/commits/master\" rel=\"nofollow\">Track changes</a>\n\nThunderbird Conversations is a Thunderbird extension which, as the name implies, enables a conversation view in your Thunderbird. Notable features include:\n<ul><li>a regular conversation view that fetches messages from all folders, and behaves just like Gmail’s</li><li>a quick reply feature, with autocomplete, that allows you to reply to a thread in a snap,</li><li>quoted parts are collapsed,</li><li>keyboard shortcuts,</li><li>and a few other bonus features.</li></ul>\n<b>Don't forget to hit View &gt; Sort By &gt; Threaded</b> in the menus. To remove the unified folder view, hit <b>View &gt; Folders &gt; All</b>.\n\n\n<b>We welcome feedback, but only if you've read the <b><a href=\"https://github.com/protz/thunderbird-conversations/wiki/faq\" rel=\"nofollow\">FAQ</a></b> before :-)</b>\n\n<b>Known Issues with Thunderbird 68</b>\n\n<ul><li><a href=\"https://github.com/protz/thunderbird-conversations/issues/1361\" rel=\"nofollow\">Quick Reply is not working in 68</a>. This is a work in progress due to the changes in TB 68.</li></ul>","it":"<a href=\"https://groups.google.com/d/topic/mozilla-labs/CZbSaSpnBxE/discussion\" rel=\"nofollow\">Lascia un feedback</a> - <a href=\"http://wiki.github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View\" rel=\"nofollow\"><b>Visita il sito web</b> (documentazione inclusa)</a> - <a href=\"http://wiki.github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View/faq\" rel=\"nofollow\">Consulta le FAQ</a> - <a href=\"http://github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View/issues\" rel=\"nofollow\">Segnala un bug</a> - <a href=\"http://github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View/commits/master\" rel=\"nofollow\">Segui le modifiche</a> - <a href=\"http://jonathan.xulforum.org/files/gcv-nightlies/\" rel=\"nofollow\">Preleva l'ultima versione di sviluppo</a>\n\n<b>I feedback sono apprezzati! Utilizzare il relativo link qui sopra per inviarne uno</b>\n\nThunderbird Conversations è un'estensione per Thunderbird che, come implica il nome stesso, permette di visualizzare le e-mail sotto forma di conversazioni. Le caratterestiche di nota sono le seguenti:\n- regolare visualizzazione sotto forma di conversazioni in modo analogo al sito web di Gmail, prendendo i messaggi da tutte le cartelle\n- integrazione con l'estensione <a href=\"https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/thunderbird/addon/243985/\" rel=\"nofollow\">Thunderbird Contacts</a>: i partecipanti hanno i tooltip nella conversazione, ed è possibile visualizzarne avatar e profili da Facebook, Twitter, etc…\n- possibilità di risposta rapida con autocompletamento\n- parti citate contratte (quindi non visibili)\n- scorciatoie da tastiera\n- alcuni altri bonus","pt-BR":"<a href=\"https://groups.google.com/d/topic/mozilla-labs/CZbSaSpnBxE/discussion\" rel=\"nofollow\">Enviar comentário</a> - <a href=\"http://wiki.github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View\" rel=\"nofollow\"><b>Site</b> (com documentação)</a> - <a href=\"http://wiki.github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View/faq\" rel=\"nofollow\">Perguntas frequentes</a> - <a href=\"http://github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View/issues\" rel=\"nofollow\">Comunicar erro</a> - <a href=\"http://github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View/commits/master\" rel=\"nofollow\">Verificar alterações</a> - <a href=\"http://jonathan.xulforum.org/files/gcv-nightlies/\" rel=\"nofollow\">Versões mais recentes em desenvolvimento</a>\n\n<b>Comentários são bem-vindos! Veja o link para enviar comentários acima. :-)</b>\n\nO Thunderbird Conversations é uma extensão para o Thunderbird que, como o nome indica, permite um modo de conversa no seu Thunderbird.\nEntre os recursos dignos de nota, temos:\n- um modo de conversa que busca mensagens em todas as pastas, funcionando igual ao do Gmail;\n- integração com a extensão <a href=\"https://addons.mozilla.org/pt-BR/thunderbird/addon/mozilla-labs-contacts/\" rel=\"nofollow\">Mozilla Labs: Contacts</a>: ao passar o mouse sobre os participantes de uma conversa, são exibidas informações sobre eles, podendo ser exibidos com avatar e perfil do Facebook, Twitter, etc;\n- um recurso que permite responder diretamente nas mensagens de uma conversa, num piscar de olhos e com preenchimento automático;\n- texto de mensagens anteriores são ocultadas;\n- atalhos de teclado;\n- e alguns outros recursos extras.","sv-SE":"<a href=\"https://groups.google.com/d/topic/mozilla-labs/CZbSaSpnBxE/discussion\" rel=\"nofollow\">Ge oss feedback</a> - <a href=\"http://wiki.github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View\" rel=\"nofollow\"><b>Webbplats</b> (inkluderar dokumentation)</a> - <a href=\"http://wiki.github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View/faq\" rel=\"nofollow\">Vanliga frågor och svar</a> - <a href=\"http://github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View/issues\" rel=\"nofollow\">Rapportera buggar</a> - <a href=\"http://github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View/commits/master\" rel=\"nofollow\">Spåra ändringar</a> - <a href=\"http://jonathan.xulforum.org/files/gcv-nightlies/\" rel=\"nofollow\">Senaste utvecklingsversionerna</a>\n\n<b>Vi älskar att få feedback! Klicka gärna på feedbacklänken ovan :-)</b>\n\nThunderbird Conversations är ett Thunderbird-tillägg som, precis som namnet antyder, ger tillgång till en konversationsvy i Thunderbird. Bland funktionerna märks:\n- en klassisk konversationsvy som hämtar meddelanden från samtliga mappar och beter sig precis som Gmails konversationsvy,\n- integrering med <a href=\"https://addons.mozilla.org/sv-SE/thunderbird/addon/mozilla-labs-contacts/\" rel=\"nofollow\">Mozilla Labs: Contacts</a>: Deltagarna har egna verktygstips i konversationen och du kan se deras användarbilder och profiler från Facebook, Twitter o.s.v.,\n- en snabbsvarsfunktion, med autokomplettering, som låter dig svara på en tråd i en handvändning,\n- citerade delar är hopfällda,\n- kortkommandon,\n- samt några ytterligare bonusfunktioner.","ja":"<a href=\"https://groups.google.com/d/topic/mozilla-labs/CZbSaSpnBxE/discussion\" rel=\"nofollow\">感想</a> - <a href=\"http://wiki.github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View\" rel=\"nofollow\"><b>ウェブサイト</b> (ドキュメント)</a> - <a href=\"http://wiki.github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View/faq\" rel=\"nofollow\">FAQ</a> - <a href=\"http://github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View/issues\" rel=\"nofollow\">バグレポート</a> - <a href=\"http://github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View/commits/master\" rel=\"nofollow\">変更点</a> - <a href=\"http://jonathan.xulforum.org/files/gcv-nightlies/\" rel=\"nofollow\">最新の開発版</a>\n\n<b>フィードバックを歓迎します! 上記の感想リンクをクリックしてください:-)</b>\n\nThunderbird Conversations は Thunderbird にスレッドビュー機能を追加するアドオンです。主な機能は:\n- スレッドビューはすべてのフォルダのメッセージからきっちり構築され、Gmail のように動作します。\n- <a href=\"https://addons.mozilla.org/ja/thunderbird/addon/243985/\" rel=\"nofollow\">Thunderbird Contacts</a> との協調: スレッドの参加者にはツールチップが表示され、Facebook や Twitter などのアバター、プロフィールを見られます。\n- クイックリプライ機能とオートコンプリート機能で、スレッドにすぐに返信できます。\n- 引用部分をたたむ機能、\n- キーボードショートカット、\n- 他にも楽しい機能があります。","pl":"<a href=\"https://groups.google.com/d/topic/mozilla-labs/CZbSaSpnBxE/discussion\" rel=\"nofollow\">Napisz opinię</a> - <a href=\"http://wiki.github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View\" rel=\"nofollow\"><b>Strona domowa</b> (zawiera dokumentację)</a> - <a href=\"http://wiki.github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View/faq\" rel=\"nofollow\">FAQ</a> - <a href=\"http://github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View/issues\" rel=\"nofollow\">Zgłoś błąd</a> - <a href=\"http://github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View/commits/master\" rel=\"nofollow\">Zobacz zmiany</a> - <a href=\"http://jonathan.xulforum.org/files/gcv-nightlies/\" rel=\"nofollow\">Najnowsze wersje rozwojowe</a>\n\n<b>Prosimy o opinie! Kliknij odnośnik znajdujący się powyżej.</b>\n\nThunderbird Conversations jest rozszerzeniem dla Thunderbirda, które, jak sama nazwa wskazuje, dodaje do Thunderbirda widok konwersacji. Ważniejsze funkcje obejmują:\n- widok konwersacji, pobierający wiadomości ze wszystkich folderów i zachowujący się, jak Gmail,\n- integrację z rozszerzeniem <a href=\"https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/thunderbird/addon/243985/\" rel=\"nofollow\">Thunderbird Contacts</a>. Po wskazaniu kursorem myszy uczestnika konwersacji jest wyświetlane okienko zawierające jego awatar i profile z Facebooka, Twittera,\n- szybką odpowiedź z automatycznym uzupełnianiem, umożliwiającą odpowiedź w wątku,\n- zwinięte cytowane elementy,\n- skróty klawiszowe,\n- i kilka innych funkcji."},"developer_comments":{"fr":"Avant de nous signaler un problème, veuillez vous assurer d'avoir parcouru la <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/f49c7449db0e01597529df259a91f826c0fe4d6fd29d2d1622ed107ebb5292fa/http%3A//wiki.github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View/faq\">FAQ</a> et installé la <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/d77edccb33ec28fb041353a7868c9a961f131a45cf4f586ff62471081fc77e93/http%3A//jonathan.xulforum.org/files/gcv-nightlies/\">dernière version de développement</a>. Zgłoś błąd przez e-mail lub za pomocą <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/383beb8a23fff13d040f1c67dcded3ce3d0efa32b423c97ff93707942c3e361b/http%3A//github.com/protz/GMail-Conversation-View/issues\">systemu śledzenia błędów</a>.\n\n<b>Ciągle używasz Thunderbirda 3.1.x? mail folders in Thunderbird. \n\nThis extension adds an extra toolbar to Thunderbird. When you drag a mail folder to it, you get a fully customizable shortcut to that mail folder. This supports full drag and drop, like the corresponding folder in the folder tree - You can drag messages on it to move/copy them to the folder, and access the bookmarked folders through keyboard shortcuts.\n\nThis is handy when you have a large tree of folders for clients or projects, but use only a few of them at the same time.\n\nThe Category feature adds more usability by adding distinct areas to work in; this can make it easier to focus on a task that needs just a subset of the folders visible. There is also excellent integration with the Thunderbird tabbed interface provided since Tb version 3.","de":"Bookmark Mail Ordner in Thunderbird. \n\nDiese Erweiterung erzeugt eine neue Werkzeugleiste in Thunderbird. Wenn Sie darauf einen Mail Ordner ziehen, erhalten Sie eine Verknüpfung auf diesen Ordner. Sie können damit auch Mails per drag &amp; drop verschieben / kopieren. \n\nDies ist praktisch wenn man eine große Verzeichnisstruktur mit vielen Ordnern hat (z.B. für Kunden, Projekte) aber normalerweise nur mit einer kleineren Auswahl davon arbeitet. \n\nDurch die neuen Kategorien lässt sich die Arbeit mit Mails noch einfacher strukturieren. Damit lassen sich die wichtigsten Ordner einer Kategorie (z.B. Arbeit / Hobby etc.) darstellen - spezielle Ordner wie z.B. Posteingang können permanent angezeigt werden. Eine genauere Beschreibung der Features können Sie auf <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/81bcacaae04e4e59b290fb2137cc5f8ad1bd9eb32bb108b05409206945d16194/http%3A//quickfolders.mozdev.org\">http://quickfolders.mozdev.org</a> ansehen.\n\nKompatibel mit Thunderbird 3.0 (beta2)"},"developer_comments":{"en-US":"<strong>Milestones</strong>\n\nFind the complete history + bug list, visit <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/f3e9c1a2fede81fbc82d9b29a51545b4a14777be31985a5c8923c9108d3a453e/http%3A//quickfolders.org/version.html\">quickfolders.org/version.html</a>\n\nThanks!!\n  Axel","de":"<strong>Was gibt's Neues und Gutes?</strong>\nErstmal hab ich die Fehlerliste von hier entfernt um diese Seite lesbarer zu machen.
